title: Your stars today
text:
See what the stars have in store for you today.

TUESDAY OCTOBER 29, 2019

ARIES March 21-April 20 ***

Being slap-dash will get you nowhere fast today Aries. Instead, find strategic ways to solve problems. Plus look to a work colleague or mentor for some positive and productive advice.

TAURUS April 21-May 21 ***

With Mercury moving through your relationship zone, stop avoiding issues and start communicating about what you really want and need. You can’t expect others to magically read your mind.

GEMINI May 22-June 21 ***

There’ll be some ups-and-downs today and you’ll feel restless. Plus relations with a close friend or colleague could be unpredictable. Perhaps some quiet solo time will stop you from feeling too frazzled?

CANCER June 22-July 23 ***

Don’t let jealousy rear its ugly head today Crabs. Have the confidence to give your partner plenty of space. Singles – avoid lightweights! Look for someone of substance, with emotional depth.

LEO July 24-Aug 23 ***

Try to view a family problem from a deeper and more mature perspective. A dash of deft diplomacy will also make all the difference! Plus use your creativity in practical and productive ways.

VIRGO Aug 24-Sep 23 ***

Make sure you examine facts and figures in a forensic way today Virgo. Verify new information and do your research thoroughly. You’ll find the devil is definitely in the hidden details.

LIBRA Sep 24-Oct 23 **

Making expensive purchases – that you later regret - is a danger, as you’re inclined to buy things for purely emotional reasons. So steer clear of your favourite local stores and online shopping sites.

SCORPIO Oct 24-Nov 22 **

Are you coming on too strong? Wield power from behind the scenes today in smart and subtle ways. Being an iron fist in a velvet glove is better than scaring people away with your Scorpio intensity.

SAGITTARIUS Nov 23-Dec 21 ****

With prosperity planet Jupiter jumping through your sign, you’ll attract positive people and situations into your world. So make sure you capitalise on the lucky opportunities that come your way.

CAPRICORN Dec 22-Jan 20 **

Expect some deep and serious discussions with others today Capricorn. You’re not keen to compromise, and others may be surprised by the intensity of your feelings or your moody manner.

AQUARIUS Jan 21-Feb 19 ***

Aquarians thrive on adventure, but have you been neglecting your overseas friends? With Mars jumping through your travel zone, be proactive about re-connecting with your international contacts.

PISCES Feb 20-March 20 ****

You’re on a creative high as you inspire others, whether at work or at home. So it’s the perfect time to express your Piscean creativity via professional projects or within a dynamic group situation.

YOUR DAY

Consider things deeply and avoid superficial encounters today.

HAPPY BIRTHDAY

You are persuasive with the power to influence others. 2020 is the year to be less obsessive and more relaxed.

Copyright Joanne Madeline Moore 2019
description: See what the stars have in store for you today.
